data.config.yml:
connectIPVersion: v4
ports:
  http: 80
  tls: 853
upstream:
  default:
    - tcp-tls:r4t7m0942c.cloudflare-gateway.com
    - https://r4t7m0942c.cloudflare-gateway.com/dns-query
    #- https://dns.quad9.net/dns-query
    #- tcp-tls:dns.quad9.net
bootstrapDns:
  - tcp+udp:9.9.9.9
blocking:
  blackLists:
    default:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/hosts # adware + malware
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/main/domains/tif.txt # Threat Intelligence Feeds
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
      - default
caching:
  prefetching: true
  minTime: "600m"
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
